Meals with beef, veal, or lamb meat emit much greenhouse gases: almost 5 times more than other mets, and 12 times more than a vegetarian meal. This is probably the easiest lever to reduce greenhouse cases without affecting the fondamentale of the project.
Including porc, poultry, rabbit, or fish in a meal doubles its carbon impact.
Prefer fresh, local, seasonal products and minimize packaging.
